nodes.bodyText:
Not sure what you mean @wburns, it was always JGroups' responsibility to suspect members. X-site backups have their own rules for taking sites offline, but a site can have 0..N site masters, all of which join the bridge cluster.
OTOH the bridge configuration already had {{FD_SOCK}}, which suspects a node once it's stopped, and tests don't remove {{FD*}} protocols from the bridge stack based on the {{TransportFlags}}, so having {{FD_ALL3}} might just complicate debugging.
